FAIR semantics
Preliminary Recommendations
8
P-Rec. 3: Use a common minimum metadata schema 
to describe semantic artefacts and their content
§ Related FAIR principles: F2, R1.1, R1.2 and R1.3
§ Existing recommendations: VOAF, Ontology
Metadata Vocabulary, etc.
§ Stakeholders: Practitioner, Repository and
